title: Beneath Your Beauty
description: SCRIPTScene: She’s the timid baker. He’s the sex god of porn. See how their lives unfold when they’re brought together. Enter Kayden Brewer.Kayden’s normal life is complete with work, friends, and two kids now in college. When her sister passes away, her life becomes unrecognizable. In a bind, she turns to her alter ego, Summer Crest, to take care of her newfound worries—that is, until she meets one man who will forever change everything.  Enter Steele Waters. With tousled brown hair, eyes the color of a cloudless blue sky, and a maintained scruff covering his chiseled jawline, he has that look about him that’s bad boy and good guy mixed together. Oh, and he’s a porn star. While Kayden is dealing with a debt owed to a drug dealer, her job, and her kids, Steele is relentless in his pursuit of her. She can’t compete with his lifestyle, but she’s not sure if she can protect her heart enough to withstand his charm. Will their lives play out with a happily ever after like in the movies? Or will they have to face the challenges of love in the real world?
author: Alexa Keith
